lead_paragraph: Lithuania rallied from an 18-point second-half deficit to beat Spain, 76-73, Tuesday in a game in Izmir, Turkey, between the two Group D favorites at the basketball world championships.
snippet: Lithuania rallied from an 18-point second-half deficit to beat Spain, 76-73, Tuesday in a game in Izmir, Turkey, between the two Group D favorites at the basketball world championships.

headline.main: Down by 18, Lithuania Tops Spain on Late Run
headline.seo: Lithuania Rallies to Top Spain at Basketball World Championships
headline.print_headline: Down by 18, Lithuania Tops Spain On Late Run
